name: Craft the Undead
description:
(For the best performance use the downloadable Version)

Take your enemies apart and use them to craft undead.
Create the biggest army of the undead you can.

A game for the JamCraft3 

Music from https://filmmusic.io:
"Five Armies" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
